headline: Akamai Named a Web Application Firewall Leader
summary: Akamai Technologies, Inc. (NASDAQ: AKAM), the cybersecurity and cloud company that powers and protects life online, today announced it was named a Leader in The Forrester Wave™: Web Application Firewall Solutions, Q1 2025 report. In the report, Forrester evaluated 10 total vendors in the WAF space based on 22 criteria grouped by current offering and strategy.
